title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not, as per the template requirements.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the dataset for the table. 
3. Try to create a new table group.
